cf.AuxiliaryCoordinate.close¶

AuxiliaryCoordinate.close()[source]¶

Close all files referenced by the auxiliary coordinate.

Note that a closed file will be automatically reopened if its contents are subsequently required.

See also

files

Examples 1: 
>>> v.close()
Returns:None
